title: Similar to Vigo and Johanneke, distinctive characters
author: mustangpinky1

comments.content: Techno from Font-Bureau published by Apple Computer

Bullseye Bob!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417011331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TechnoDavidBerlow4Apple1995iInUse_4273.jpg)
  
Note that the image is a horizontally stretched application of Techno.  
Techno was created by David Berlow for Apple in 1995. A TrueType version of this font was installed with Mac OS 9.  
Don

My information is that Techno is not available for purchase. A search of Font Bureau did not produce any result. Presumably David Berlow/Font Bureau produced the font for Apple but has not offered it to the public?  
Don
Maybe look for a old Mac System Disk CD or search your hard drive - I have it on my machine but only in an old font files folder
Thanks for you help, I guess its limited platform explains why whatfontis and what the font in corel was unable to find the font. I have it on my system so that saved me time.
